results.name: Leather Goddesses of Phobos 2: Gas Pump Girls Meet the Pulsating Inconvenience from Planet X
Magic & Mayhem: The Art of Magic

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti 2GB or AMD HD 6450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 280X (3GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 590 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: European Air War supports only LAN Multiplayer

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: Intel CPU with 4 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GPU, Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
